# Project Team Context: Talento-Tech 2025-2
**Location:** Medellín / UdeA
**Squad Size:** 7 members

## Team Composition & Narrative
The squad is primarily composed of **Physics students from UdeA**, bringing high mathematical rigor and an experimental approach to the financial data. 

## Members & Roles
- **Pablo Sanchez (Physics - UdeA):** Technical Lead & Integrator. Responsible for "Unificación," 8-notebook architecture, and Anomaly Detection.
- **Jose Ortiz (Physics - UdeA):** Co-Lead. Scraper & Statistical Analyst (Causality).
- **David Alava & Sebastian Agudelo (Physics - UdeA):** NLP Specialists (FinBERT implementation).
- **Dayana Henao (Physics - UdeA):** ML Engineer (LSTM & Gold Price EDA).
- **Luis Vera (Forestry Engineer):** EDA Specialist (News data).
- **Michael Tarazona (Electrical Engineering - UdeA):** Junior support.

## Leadership Vision
My leadership focused on 'Integration.' I took 7 scientific minds and unified their diverse workstreams into a single functional pipeline.
